articles.author: Oli Gamp
articles.title: Tommy Fury's failure to fight Jake Paul is one he may NEVER come back from - Daily Mail
articles.description: The problem with a professional boxer fighting a YouTuber is that you have to beat him - or suffer a lifetime of humiliation. For Tommy Fury, his failure to even get in the ring is embarrassing.
